var rows = $input.all().map(function(i) { return i.json; }).filter(function(i) { return i.id; });
const items = rows.map(row => ({
  id: row.id,
  memberId: row.member_id,
  membreNom: (row.membre_nom || '') + ' ' + (row.membre_prenom || ''),
  type: row.type,
  statut: row.statut,
  dateDebut: row.date_debut,
  dateFin: row.date_fin,
  salaireBase: Number(row.salaire_base || 0),
  poste: row.poste,
  departement: row.departement,
  avantages: row.avantages,
  clauseParticuliere: row.clause_particuliere,
  motifFin: row.motif_fin,
  createdAt: row.created_at,
  updatedAt: row.updated_at
}));
return [{json: {success: true, data: items}}];
